statements: DELETE FROM exploratory_missions WHERE launch_date = '2023-07-15' AND destination_planet = 'Mars';
DELETE FROM missions WHERE mission_name = 'Apollo 11' AND mission_status = 'Complete';
DELETE FROM discoveries WHERE mission_id = 3 AND discovery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Mission WHERE mission_name = 'Mars Mission';
DELETE FROM Astronaut WHERE mission_id = 3 AND astronaut_age > 30;
DELETE FROM Spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_id = 105 AND spacecraft_name = 'Voyager';
DELETE FROM Discovery WHERE discovery_id = 203 AND discovery_name = 'Mars Rover' AND discovery_location = 'Mars';
